Articles.Content:
I just installed a mod and the game was rynning perfectly...but next time when i started, my engines were already activated at assembly....

Spoiler
Spoiler

Moved thread to the Technical Support/Modded area of the forum.

Welcome to the forums Roscosmo! Unfortunately, it looks like we're probably going to need more information before we can answer your question. Which mod did you install? Do you mean that your engines were already running (ie, actively burning fuel and not just throttled up) without having to stage them first?
